metadata.Title: CVE-2018-21245 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Pound before 2.8 allows HTTP request smuggling, a related issue to CVE-2016-10711.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pound - 2.6-6.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> patch is the same as in CVE-2016-10711 in jessie

criterions.comment: pound package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-6.1ubuntu0.1').
